coms309.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • coms309.controller.UserController

  • @RestController
public class UserController
extends Object
    Controller for user endpoints.

    HTTP 200 = good request.

    HTTP 202 = good request and data has been changed.

    HTTP 403 = incorrect permission.

    HTTP 404 = user or data not found.

      • getUserList

        @GetMapping(value="/user")
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ApiUser>> getUserList(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                    String token)
        Get a list of all users.

        Client must be teacher or admin.

        Get request, path "/user".

        Parameters:
        token - permission token
        Returns:
        HTTP response, list of users
